verbose_text: TEW-7197 also abrogated TGF-beta1-induced enhancement in extracellular matrix production and hydroxyproline content in PD fibroblast in vitro by blocking TGF-beta1-induced phosphorylation and nuclear translocation of Smad2 and Smad3, and by inhibiting TGF-beta1-induced transdifferentiation of fibroblasts into myofibroblasts.
evidence: phosphorylation and nuclear translocation of Smad2
